name: Smartwool PhD Nordic Medium Ski Socks - Unisex
description: Designed for durability in high-impact strike zones, so the heel and toe won’t wear out first. 4-way fit system increases the sock’s recovery and ability to stay put on your foot. Step into comfort.Made of soft, itch-free merino wool, with nylon and spandex to maintain fit.Banded fit system with flex zones to eliminate bunching, slipping, and sagging.Mesh pockets in the arch and forefoot improve breathability and manage temperature.Flat knit side panels and toe seams reduce compression.Reinforced high-impact zones prolong the life of the sock.
